itunes:title: Leviticus Week 2 with Phylicia Masonheimer
title: Leviticus Week 2 with Phylicia Masonheimer
description:
For Week 2 of Leviticus, Raechel and Amanda are joined by author and Bible teacher, Phylicia Masonheimer. You don’t want to miss their discussion about how this section of Leviticus continually points us to God’s kindness and mercy in making a way for broken people to be near to Him. Join us in reflecting on how relevant God’s working all the way back in Leviticus is for us today. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Leviticus reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Leviticus collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 


Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/leviticus-week-2-with-phylicia-masonheimer
